top_themes: Oversupply from West Africa and elsewhere

query_results.top_post: #Cocoa prices have collapsed... New York futures slumped to a fresh

Cocoa farmers from Sefwi Wiaso have arrived at the COCOBOD headquarters in buses to express their dissatisfaction with the recent reduction in cocoa prices due to the drop in global market rates. (254 likes)

reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - January FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, revealed a surprise hawkish tilt with several officials discussing potential rate hikes if inflation remains sticky. This sentiment was exacerbated by a 'hot' 0.4% MoM Core PCE report released on February 20, 2026, which signaled persistent price pressures.

payload.summary: January FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, revealed a surprise hawkish tilt with several officials discussing potential rate hikes if inflation remains sticky. This sentiment was exacerbated by a 'hot' 0.4% MoM Core PCE report released on February 20, 2026, which signaled persistent price pressures.
payload.market_impact: Strong upward pressure on the US Dollar (USD) and Treasury yields; significant downward pressure on gold, silver, and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.
